/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC    -shared -Wl,-soname,libSkeleton_Writer.so -o libSkeleton_Writer.so CMakeFiles/Skeleton_Writer.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Skeleton_Writer.dir/Ni_Device.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Skeleton_Writer.dir/Ni_Capture.cpp.o -lcoreapi -lOpenNI /usr/local/lib64/libfltk_images.so /usr/local/lib64/libfltk_forms.so /usr/local/lib64/libfltk_gl.so -lGL /usr/local/lib64/libfltk.so -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lm -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib64:
